item.title: Montell Jordan - This Is How We Do It
item.description:

do it

do it)
La la la la la la la
La la lo lo lo lo oh

do it)

It’s Friday night
And I feel all right
The party’s here on

So I reach for my
40 and I turn it up

take the keys

‘Cause I’m faded

In the street say

In Kani

So tip up your cup
and throw
